baseline_groups.claim_summary: Politically connected sugar mill chairmen manipulate cane prices during election years via interaction of political connection and election timing on real sugarcane prices.
baseline_groups.notes: Baseline replicates Table 2 Column 2. Treatment interall is polcon x election-year interaction. Negative sign means connected mills pay LOWER prices during elections within mill FE. Uses mill+year FE, mill clustering, capacity and rainfall controls.

global_notes: 78 total specs. One baseline group for rprice ~ interall with mill+year FE. Specs changing treatment to decomposed connection measures (pcinter, acinter, pcconnected, acconnected, polcon_only) are alternative treatments not testing the same estimand. Alternative outcomes (recovery, actualhours, etc.) not part of core claim. robust/sample/no_polcheck_mills reports capacity as treatment (interall is zero for never-connected mills, extraction artifact). robust/control/minimal duplicates robust/control/capacity_only exactly.
